title: Teen Court: Local teens to gain experience as attorneys (City of Amarillo, TX)
text: ( Source : City of Amarillo, TX ) This Saturday, Oct. 10 , a group of 13 local junior and high school students will begin an attorney training session at the City of Amarillo 's Municipal Court . The students, who applied to take part in the
